--delimiter.desc: delimiter to separate columns. default comma (,). e.g. --delimiter=#

--quote.desc: quote surrounding a column content containing delimiters. default double quote ("). e.g. --quote=#

--trim.desc: Indicate if parser trim off spaces surrounding column content. e.g. " content " will be trimmed to "content". Default: true

--checkType.desc: This parameter turns on and off whether check field type. default is true.

--ignoreEmpty.desc: This parameter turns on and off whether ignore empty column values while parsing. default is false
